sect1.title: Upgrading from previous versions
sect1.para: In this section, we list the changes what users should take into account before upgrading to Hazelcast 3.0 from earlier versions of Hazelcast.

listitem.para: With 3.0 there will be no member type as lite member. As 3.0 clients are smart client that they know in which node the data is located, you can replace your lite members with native clients.
